testcase.name: User is able to create Opportunitie
testcase.system-out: Given Open the Salesforce Website...........................................passed When verify the Salesforce page title.......................................passed Then Login with valid username and password "vedant.jagani@campingworld.com.test" and "Welcome2019*".passed And Click login button......................................................passed And Verify Salesforce Home page title.......................................passed Then Click on the Opportunities tab.........................................passed Then Click on the New button................................................passed Then Select a record type and click Next....................................passed And Populate System Admin Layout fields.....................................passed And Opportunity Information.................................................passed And Interested In Attributes................................................passed And Interested In Details...................................................passed And Towing Information......................................................passed And Currently Own Trade-InCurrently Own TradeIn from Web Lead fields........passed And Pupulate Info from lead fields..........................................passed And Lead Source.............................................................passed And Enter the Description Information.......................................passed And Other data fields.......................................................passed And Populate the System Information fields..................................passed Then Click the Save button..................................................passed
